      • getCity

        public City getCity()
        This method gets the City in which the Hotel stands. It calls the AbstractFabric.getById(int) with idCity.
        Returns:
        The City of the Hotel.

      • getRooms

        public java.util.List<HotelRoom> getRooms()
        This method gets the List of HotelRoom of this Hotel. It calls the HotelRoomFabric.getRoomsOf(Hotel) with this.
        Returns:
        The List of HotelRoom of this Hotel.

      • getCategories

        public java.util.List<Category> getCategories()
        This method gets the List of Category of this Hotel. It calls the CategoryFabric.getCategoriesOf(Hotel) with this.
        Returns:
        The List of Category of this Hotel.
